Class GuessGenerator

  • java.lang.Object
    • cwtwo.GuessGenerator
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    CodeGenerator

    public class GuessGenerator
extends java.lang.Object
implements CodeGenerator
    An implementation of code generator that generates a code based on an input guess from the player of the game.
